name: Soldier vs Demons
description:
Hi!

This is my second game. You are the soldier and your mission is kill demons in the cave. Good luck and have fun!

This game was suppose to be longer, but I cancelled it due to lack of time and fact that I want to start working on other projects. But I hope you will have fun anyway!

Requirements:

-Tested on Windows 10, should work also on Windows 11; require 64-bit version

-Tested on Nvidia GPU, I don't recommend old GPU,

-IMPORTANT: It may be necessary to give the game access to the internet (allow if Windows ask about it).

Don't upload game on other web pages (you can always paste link to the game).

Paste link to this game if you record this on YT or anywhere else.

The creator:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Miki1877852468

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ0LzpilrLkSSuOC226Evdg

Warning: I'm not responsible for any computer damage or health injuries caused playing this game.
